verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> against the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, before that Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> Gaza <S%H5804><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; Behold, waters <S%H4325><s%> rise up <S%H5927><s%> out of the north <S%H6828><s%>, and shall be an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> flood <S%H5158><s%>, and shall overflow <S%H7857><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and all that is therein <S%H4393><s%>; the city <S%H5892><s%>, and them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein: then the men <S%H120><s%> shall cry <S%H2199><s%>, and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall howl <S%H3213><s%>.

At the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the stamping <S%H8161><s%> of the hoofs <S%H6541><s%> of his strong <S%H47><s%> horses, at the rushing <S%H7494><s%> of his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and at the rumbling <S%H1995><s%> of his wheels <S%H1534><s%>, the fathers <S%H1><s%> shall not look back <S%H6437><s%> to their children <S%H1121><s%> for feebleness <S%H7510><s%> of hands <S%H3027><s%>;

Because of the day <S%H3117><s%> that cometh <S%H935><s%> to spoil <S%H7703><s%> all the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and to cut off <S%H3772><s%> from Tyrus <S%H6865><s%> and Zidon <S%H6721><s%> every helper <S%H5826><s%> that remaineth <S%H8300><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will spoil <S%H7703><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the country <S%H339><s%> of Caphtor <S%H3731><s%>.

Baldness <S%H7144><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> upon Gaza <S%H5804><s%>; Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> is cut off <S%H1820><s%> with the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of their valley <S%H6010><s%>: how long wilt thou cut <S%H1413><s%> thyself?

O <S%H1945><s%> thou sword <S%H2719><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, how long will it be ere <S%H3808><s%> thou be quiet <S%H8252><s%>? put up <S%H622><s%> thyself into thy scabbard <S%H8593><s%>, rest <S%H7280><s%>, and be still <S%H1826><s%>.

How can it be quiet <S%H8252><s%>, seeing the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath given it a charge <S%H6680><s%> against Ashkelon <S%H831><s%>, and against the sea <S%H3220><s%> shore <S%H2348><s%>? there hath he appointed <S%H3259><s%> it.
